ModMetaData.name: Advanced Animal Framework
ModMetaData.author: Mingji Lim aka WalkingProblem, updated by Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
Unoffical Temp update for WalkingProblem's Advanced Animal Framework for RimWorld 1.2 with added support for RF fishing spots and Quarry use. using the same packageId as the original. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1336991209
This is the core framework that allows animals to carry weapons, do various work and for special autonomous animal-like vehicles. Does not add content on its own.
